p: Phosphate phosphate, sodium Chloride, acetone, sodium carbonate were purchased from Acros Organics (USA). Methanol (MeOH), Dithiothreitol (DTT), Ethyline Diamine Tetra Acetic acid (EDTA), 2-propanol, Nitro blue tetrazolium chloride (NBT), Guaiacol, α-Naphthyl acetate solution, Fast blue BB, xylenol orange disodium salt, sulfuric acid (H 2SO 4), Sodium chloride (NaCl), ferrous ammonium sulphate, glycerol, o-Dianisidine, Potassium acetate, α-amylase enzyme, 3, 5-dinitrosalicylic acid, bovine serum albumin, hydrochloric acid (HCl), hydrogen peroxide H 2O 2, sodium acetate, Glacial acetic acid, Aluminium chloride AlCl 2, sodium phosphate, and 2, 2'-Azino-Bis-3-Ethylbenzothiazoline-6-Sulfonic Acid (ABTs) were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (Merck Germany). Polyvinyl Pyrrolidone (PVPP), starch and Acetic acid were purchased from Bio-world GeneLinx International, Inc., USA. Folin-Ciocalteu (FC) Reagent, Bradford dye, Sodium Dodecyl Sulfate (SDS) were purchased from Thermo Fisher Scientific UK. 2, 6-dichloroindophenol (DCIP) was purchased from Millipore Sigma US.
